<body>

<div class="homepage">

```         
  <div class="div">
    <footer class="footer">
      <div class="overlap-group">
        <div class="rectangle"></div>
        <div class="text-wrapper">Copyright</div>
        <div class="text-wrapper-2">Terms of use</div>
        <div class="text-wrapper-3">Privacy policy</div>
        <div class="rectangle-2"></div>
        <p class="ecoassets-received">
          <span class="span">EcoAssets received investment (</span>
          <a href="https://doi.org/10.47486/XN005" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"
            ><span class="span">doi.org/10.47486/XN005</span></a
          >
          <span class="span"
            >) from the Australian Research Data Commons (ARDC). The ARDC is funded by the Australian Research Data
            National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy (NCRIS).</span
          >
        </p>
        <div class="frame">
          <div class="logos">
            <img class="img" src="img/rectangle-10.png" />
            <img class="rectangle-3" src="img/rectangle-11.png" />
            <img class="rectangle-4" src="img/rectangle-12.png" />
            <img class="rectangle-5" src="img/rectangle-13.png" />
            <img class="rectangle-6" src="img/rectangle-14.png" />
            <img class="rectangle-7" src="img/rectangle-15.png" />
          </div>
        </div>
        <p class="acknowledgement-of">
          <span class="text-wrapper-4">Acknowledgement of Traditional Owners and Country<br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-5"
            ><br />The project partners acknowledge Australia’s Traditional Owners and pay respect to the past and
            present Elders of the nation’s Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities. We honour and
            celebrate the spiritual, cultural and customary connections of Traditional Owners to the country and the
            biodiversity that forms part of that country.</span
          >
        </p>
        <img class="line" src="img/line-1.svg" />
      </div>
      <div class="rectangle-8"></div>
    </footer>
    <div class="news">
      <div class="overlap">
        <p class="p">
          <span class="text-wrapper-6">News<br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-7"><br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-8">View latest updates &gt; </span>
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="data">
      <div class="explore-data-explore-wrapper">
        <p class="p">
          <span class="text-wrapper-6">Explore Data<br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-7"><br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-8"
            >Explore the latest aggregated datasets for biodiversity and monitoring data from the ALA, IMOS and
            TERN.<br /><br />See data &gt;</span
          >
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="welcome">
      <div class="overlap">
        <p class="p">
          <span class="text-wrapper-6">Welcome to EcoAssets<br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-7"><br /></span>
          <span class="text-wrapper-8"
            >EcoAssets brings together environmental data collected from three national research infrastructures –
            the ALA, IMOS and TERN. By standardising the formats of these data resources and then sharing them, the
            information can be streamlined into integrated data assets to support Australia&#39;s environmental
            reporting needs.<br /><br />Learn more &gt;</span
          >
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <header class="header">
      <div class="overlap-2">
        <div class="title-background">
          <div class="div-wrapper"><div class="text-wrapper-9">EcoAssets</div></div>
          <div class="rectangle-9"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="nav-bar">
          <div class="overlap-3">
            <div class="text-wrapper-10">About</div>
            <img class="fi-bs-caret-down" src="img/fi-bs-caret-down.svg" />
          </div>
          <div class="overlap-4">
            <div class="text-wrapper-11">Data</div>
            <img class="fi-bs-caret-down-2" src="img/fi-bs-caret-down.svg" />
          </div>
          <div class="text-wrapper-12">News</div>
          <img class="fi-bs-search" src="img/fi-bs-search.svg" />
          <img class="fi-bs-home" src="img/fi-bs-home.svg" />
        </div>
      </div>
    </header>
    <img class="main-image" src="img/main-image.png" />
  </div>
</div>
```
